thread.section_title: First Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very good
thread.title_full: Very good - Review of First Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sanem S
title: Very good
text:
Very friendly staff.
Very spacious and clean room. (Suit with Eiffel Tower view)
Room view was great.
Bathroom was quite small but this is very common at Paris hotels.
Only unsatisfying thing was breakfast. For instance there was only one kind of cheese in a country that is cheese heaven. But it would not deter me from staying at this hotel again.
Room Tip: Suit with Eiffel Tower view See more room tips
